* Updated EZTV URL.

plugins.title: Invidious
plugins.synopsis: Search & Stream Videos / Music from Invidious
plugins.description:
Changelog (15/06/24):

* Randomized Sub Feed.

* Added Menu Options for 'Check for New Releases' to Save Resources.

* Lowered Default Recommendation Value (Subscription feed added to compensate).

* Improved Loading Statements.

plugins.author: Andreas Smas, Superfan
plugins.title: Opensubtitles
plugins.description: Installing this plugin will make Movian automatically search for subtitles online at opensubtitles.com when playing a movie

plugins.author: F0R3V3R50F7
plugins.title: Internet Archive
plugins.synopsis: Search, Save & Stream Videos & Audio from Archive.org
plugins.description:
Changelog (27/05/24):

* Fixed Favorites Appending Oldest to Newest.

* Added Page Header Icon (Archive.org Logo).

* Added Warning Messages About Retricted Files.

* Fixed File Names Including the Folder Title.

* Added Donation Prompt for Archive.org Team.
